__TOC__

One of the groups of the public that we should be making more aware of Ubuntu and open source in general are our policy makers.  To that end, we are working on organizing an effort to send an Ubuntu CD and explanatory letter to every member of the state legislature, congressional delegation, and the governor.  This page serves to track relationships with those representatives.  Please add your name in the "Member(s)" column for anyone you would be willing to follow up with, bolding your name if you are actually in their district.  (To save on postage, these may be hand-delivered by a small group of us.)

Please see the suggestions compiled on LoCoActivism
